page.title: 08GOLF& CRICKET AT DRUMPELLIER
page.content: The land occupied by{Drumpellier Golf {Club}has been devoted to pleasure since{1735}when the{Glasgow"Tobacco {Lord" Buchanan}bought the estate.He was so rich that farming of land was relegated a back seat and the area was called{"PLEASURE GROUND" This modern{"Pleasure Ground"}the {golf course}has been there for eighty- five years. It is a{private club}with a membership of{450 gents}and{150 {ladies.}The{membership fee}is around {Â£264}with an{annual subscription}of {Â£132 per annum. There are{eighteen holes}stretching over a length of{6227 yards. Several{pro_am tournaments}are held there.
